scripts.cdk:bootstrap:env: npm run build && cdk bootstrap aws://$CDK_ACCOUNT/$CDK_REGION
scripts.cdk:bootstrap:auto: npm run build && bash -lc 'if [ -n "$AWS_PROFILE" ]; then cdk bootstrap --profile $AWS_PROFILE; else cdk bootstrap; fi'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && bash -lc 'if [ -n "$AWS_PROFILE" ]; then cdk deploy --require-approval never --profile $AWS_PROFILE; else cdk deploy --require-approval never; fi'
scripts.destroy: bash -lc 'if [ -n "$AWS_PROFILE" ]; then cdk destroy --profile $AWS_PROFILE; else cdk destroy; fi'
